author: By Jake Sherman and Anna Palmer
title: POLITICO Playbook: The pile-on against China
description: And Jared Kushner’s team seeks a national coronavirus surveillance system.
content:
If any foreign policy change is emerging in the post-coronavirus era, it's the desire to tangle with and inch away from China. | Ng Han Guan/AP Photo
